Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Clippers beat the Dallas Mavericks 110-96 in a preseason game.
Derrick Jones Jr., who signed with the Clippers in the offseason, scored 12 points.
Ivica Zubac made a hook shot in the second quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Clippers coach Tyronn Lue expressed excitement about having their own arena.
Derrick Jones Jr. praised the new arena and expressed his happiness to play there.
Mavericks coach Jason Kidd complimented the new arena and mentioned the fan experience.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first basketball event held at the new Intuit Dome.
The Intuit Dome features advanced technology such as facial recognition for entry and a double-sided halo board.
The arena is carbon-free and cashless.
The Intuit Dome is located near other major sports and entertainment venues like Sofi Stadium and The Kia Forum.
The arena will host the 2026 All-Star Game and basketball for the 2028 Olympics in Los Angeles.
